evs.analysisunits
Class Bootstrap

java.lang.Object
  evs.analysisunits.Bootstrap
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.TreeMap<Metric,MetricResult>>
public class Bootstrap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.TreeMap<Metric,MetricResult>>

Class to support parallel execution of bootstrap samples for verification metrics. This may be extended to skill metrics in future, if a significant number of additional skill metrics are added.

Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Constructor Summary
Bootstrap(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,PairedData[]> bsInput, Metric[] metrics, boolean spatialDep, boolean skipCheck, ProgressMonitor monitor)
          Construct a bootstrap sample object.

Constructor Detail

Bootstrap

public Bootstrap(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,PairedData[]> bsInput,
                 Metric[] metrics,
                 boolean spatialDep,
                 boolean skipCheck,
                 ProgressMonitor monitor)
Construct a bootstrap sample object. The input metrics are deep copied.

Parameters:
bsInput - paired data indexed by forecast type
metrics - the metrics to bootstrap
spatialDep - is true for perfect spatial dependence, false for independence
skipCheck - is true to skip all checks of inputs (e.g. after first sample)
monitor - a progress monitor to update with progress
Method Detail

call

public java.util.TreeMap<Metric,MetricResult> call()
                                            throws ProgressStoppedException
Computes a bootstrap result. Throws a stopped exception if the process is stopped during execution.

Specified by:
call in interface java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.TreeMap<Metric,MetricResult>>
Returns:
a map of metric results indexed by unique metric identifier
Throws:
ProgressStoppedException
